name: Myth of Metis
description:
Follow Lana, a high-school student, as she gains a new friend who helps her build confidence in herself and discover her potential. 

Art by Dumpling Cloud (twitter:  @Cloud_Dumplings)

Writing and programming by Snake Bites, velvetdusk, nivibee, adexia

Made for the UCSC COSMOS 2022 final project
